name: Gathering on Halloween Night to Summon
name_original: Gathering on Halloween Night to Summon
description:
A story of someone asking their friends to come over on halloween because their parents are out of town.

A story of a man waking up in a house that is seemingly haunted.

These two stories are related by one thing - a ritual. But how exactly are they connected? Explore the house and find notes in order to figure it out, but there's ghosts!

''Gathering on Halloween Night to Summon'' is a short (5-10 minute long) adventure game made in like 3 or 4 hours. It is meant to be a horror game parody, and hence is not particulary scary. Do watch out, however, as a few sudden scares do occur.
